summary: This is an email chain from July 27, 2019, discussing a news report that Jeffrey Epstein's former cellmate, an ex-cop, claims to have saved Epstein from a suicide attempt by hanging. The email is sent from a Material Handler Supervisor at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email, described as a multimillionaire sex offender whose ex-cop cellmate claims to have saved him from hanging.

events.title: Email about Epstein suicide attempt claim
events.description: An email is sent discussing a news report where Jeffrey Epstein's ex-cop cellmate claims to have saved Epstein from a hanging suicide attempt.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: An email from July 27, 2019, references a claim that Jeffrey Epstein's ex-cop cellmate saved him from a hanging suicide attempt.
The email originates from a Material Handler Supervisor at the Federal Bureau of Prisons' Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The document is marked as 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY case files (SDNY_00011690).
